question: Will there be graduation pictures?
answer: Yes! There will be a livestream at twitch.tv/QuaranteenU and your name will be read publicly in chat.

question: How much does it cost to attend?
answer: It's free! You'll need a Minecraft account to log onto the graduation server though.

question: Who can attend?
answer: We ask that only graduating seniors walk - this is on the honor system. If you are a proud parent or friend, there will be seats for you in the audience (which will also be livestreamed).

question: Can I help?
answer: Message us on Facebook! We're looking for Minecraft builders/modders and people with AWS experience.
